xuse:entry.xuse:title: Product
xuse:entry.xuse:description: A product represents an installable unit wich works as a single program.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ProductRelease
xuse:entry.xuse:description: A product release represents a concrete version of a given product. This way, with different versions, we have different properties, like default configuration or OS compatibility.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ProductInstance
xuse:entry.xuse:description: An instance of a product release represents the installation of a release in a given VM.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ProductInstanceSearchCriteria
xuse:entry.xuse:description: In order to find some products, the system provides a mechanism to search by a criteria.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: Application
xuse:entry.xuse:description: An application represents an installable unit wich need one or more products to be installed and working (i.e. a web application like wordpress or hudson, etc.).

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ApplicationRelease
xuse:entry.xuse:description: Represents a concrete version of an Application. It could be installed in a list of product releases.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ApplicationInstance
xuse:entry.xuse:description: When an ApplicationRelease is installed on a given VM the System creates an ApplicationInstance.âˆ«

xuse:entry.xuse:title: ApplicationInstanceSearchCriteria
xuse:entry.xuse:description: In order to find some applications, the system provides a mechanism to search by a criteria.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: SearchCriteria
xuse:entry.xuse:description:
In order to find a collection of any kind of elements, the system provides a mechanism to make a pagination and ordenation. It consists in some attributes listed bellow:
Page size
Page number
Order by field
Order type

xuse:entry.xuse:title: FSMValidationConvention
xuse:entry.xuse:description: In order to assure the State Finite Machine that represents the instances (both product and application) life cycle System provides a mechanism to validate whether possible actions on instances could be performed. It means, every use case defined in provisioning package shall be implicit exception flow to define this validation.
